basic.blooming: Flowering period May-June, fruiting period August-October
basic.color: Flower color light green, fruit color red

maintenance.soil: Soil with loose texture or special humus soil
maintenance.sunlight: Like shade environments, put in places with scattered light
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly after soil surface dries, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove aged tissues, dead and pest branches timely
